description.value:
This wine, prepared using the blood of a creature with overwhelming vitality, soothes the body, mind, and spirit with a temporary sense of euphoria and rest. When you drink wine of the blood, you recover [[/r 2d10[healing]]]{2d10 Hit Points}. Additionally, the wine attempts to counteract every negative emotion effect affecting you, with a counteract rank of 3 and a counteract modifier of +9. Lastly, you gain a +1 status bonus to all Will saves, or a +2 status bonus against emotion effects, for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Wine of the Blood]
